title: LFM Clash Team Silver 2 - Gold 3 Top or Mid
body: LFM Clash Team Silver 2 - Gold 3 Mid or Top Will start at 7pm Friday and run from then till late, Sat/Sun Will Run From Around Midday for approx 4-5hrs more if possible. Add Luciferno if you can make these times thanks.

replies.body: Me. I'll add u in a second
